EmailTemplate.subject: FINAL REMINDER: Please Update SunPower Leads Today! {!Opportunity.Account}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.OwnerFullName},
This email serves as a final reminder for you to contact and update the following SunPower lead in the SunPower Partner Portal today, {!EmailMessage.CreatedDate}, before 5pm PST local time.
{!Opportunity.Account} {!Opportunity.Primary_Campaign_Source_text__c}
If the lead above is not updated in the Partner Portal by 5pm today, they will be reassigned to another SunPower Dealer and {!Opportunity.Partner_Account_text__c} will be prohibited from contacting the reassigned lead in the future your participation in this campaign may be terminated.
To update your lead(s) immediately, please follow these 3 easy steps:
1. Log on to the SunPower Partner Portal 2. Go to Opportunities tab and select SunPower Leads from the dropdown. 3. Open the lead that needs to be updated and change the Opportunity Stage to ‘Contacted’. Save your changes.
If you have any questions, please call 1-800-SUNPOWER or email us at customersupport@sunpowercorp.com.
Regards,
Myrel SunPower Customer Support Team www.sunpowercorp.com 1800-SUNPOWER ext. 33637
